titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 16300 Broadway Avenue in Maple Heights, Ohio, as the "Daniel Kondas Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/2/2011--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 16300 Broadway Avenue in Maple Heights, Ohio, as the "Daniel Kondas Post Office."
